metadata.description: Professional Laravel and Livewire development toolkit featuring 11 specialized AI agents, 35 slash commands, and comprehensive tools for building modern PHP applications with Laravel 12, Livewire 4, and Filament 4

plugins.name: laravel-development
plugins.description: Core Laravel development with 9 specialized agents (architecture, Eloquent, testing, security, optimization, Pulse, Reverb, Socialite, Prompts) and 17 slash commands for models, migrations, controllers, jobs, and more

plugins.name: livewire-development
plugins.description: Livewire 4 reactive components with specialized agent and 4 slash commands for creating components, forms, layouts, and attributes

plugins.name: filament-development
plugins.description: Filament 4 admin panels with specialized agent and 11 slash commands for resources, pages, widgets, themes, panels, clusters, importers, exporters, and custom fields

plugins.name: vue-nuxt-development
plugins.description: Vue 3 + Nuxt 4 + TypeScript development with 8 specialized agents (Vue/Nuxt architecture, TypeScript, state management, testing, security, UX, performance) and 8 slash commands for components, pages, layouts, composables, stores, plugins, middleware, and API clients

plugins.name: magento2-development
plugins.description: Magento 2 / Adobe Commerce development with 4 specialized agents (Magento architecture, e-commerce specialist, performance, security) and 4 slash commands for modules, models, controllers, and plugins
